newsitem.title: USA: Banc One in pact with CYBERTEK.
newsitem.headline: Banc One in pact with CYBERTEK.

text.p: Banc One Mortgage, a unit of Banc One Corp, on Tuesday said it has agreed to license its Mortgage loan origination management system software to a unit of CYBERTEK Corp.
In the agreement, Banc One will provides CYBERTEK's COGENSYS, its mortgage banking subsidiary, with a database system that will support mortgage loan origination, processing and secondary marketing.
CYBERTEK is a subsidiary of Policy Management Systems Corp .
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

In a statement, Banc One Mortgage President Jeffrey Gaia said, "This relationship takes advantage of CYBERTEK's technology strengths in development and distribution and of Banc One Mortgage's strengths in mortgage product delivery."
